source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
        [Customer No_],
        [Route Code],
        [Customer Group Code],
        [Item No_],
        [Start Date],
        [DLP Target Qty],
        [Target Qty],
        [End Date],
        [Item Unit of Measure],
        [Pack Group Code],
        [Month],
        [Year],
        [Last Modified],
        [Pack Title],
	'10001' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Cust Target]
where  [Year] =2021 AND [Month]>=2
UNION ALL
SELECT
        [Customer No_],
        [Route Code],
        [Customer Group Code],
        [Item No_],
        [Start Date],
        [DLP Target Qty],
        [Target Qty],
        [End Date],
        [Item Unit of Measure],
        [Pack Group Code],
        [Month],
        [Year],
        [Last Modified],
        [Pack Title],
	   '10002' as Site_Code

select a.* from [dbo].[Target] a left join [dbo].[watermarktarget] b on a.Site_Code = b.Site_Code 
where a.[MONTH] > b.max_month or a.[Year] > b.max_year;

activities.name: get_all_files_lastmodified
activities.description: get all files lastmodified and use latest file to dump in a temp csv filr.
